## Find source and headers
FILE(GLOB HEADERS *.h)
FILE(GLOB SOURCES *.c*)

IF(CMAKE_HAS_SORT)
  LIST(SORT HEADERS)
  LIST(SORT SOURCES)
ENDIF(CMAKE_HAS_SORT)

## Build
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
)

ADD_LIBRARY(glee STATIC ${SOURCES} ${HEADERS})

if(${CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME} MATCHES "Windows")
	TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(glee opengl32.lib)
endif(${CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME} MATCHES "Windows")
